page.title: 05The New Peterborough
page.content: The latest chapter in the history of Peterborough is very much on people's minds at the moment. For the past decade Peterborough has been changing dramatically under the influence of the Development Corporation. This is a Government agency which has had the task, in conjunction with the city and county councils, of planning and shaping the new Peterborough. We who live here, both long-term residents and newcomers, have watched the continuing changes with interest, and have felt their effects as they have happened. With very little dissent our collective feeling has become one of pride as the heart of our city has been attractively developed and the new housing areas have been landscaped with abundant shrubs and trees.
